mapper.select: select prize_id from inno72_activity_plan_game_result where prize_type = 2 and activity_plan_id = #{activityPlanId} and result_code = #{report} limit 1

select SUM(ifnull(i4.goods_count,0)) as goodsCount from inno72_activity_plan_game_result i1 left join inno72_goods i2 on i1.prize_id = i2.id left join inno72_supply_channel_goods i3 on i3.goods_id = i2.id left join inno72_supply_channel i4 on i4.id = i3.supply_channel_id where i1.prize_type = 1 and i1.activity_plan_id = #{platId} and i4.machine_id = #{machineId} and i4.is_delete = 0 group by i2.id
